Posts.Content: Aug 6, 2017 09:14AM Jomama60 wrote: I'm a 22-year Survivor of stage 3 breast cancer. I had lymph node involvement and 9 of 15 lymph nodes were positive. I had a lumpectomy and radiation and I did have Adrymycin & Cytoxin treatment. The worst side effects I had from the Adrymycin or horrible horrible mouth sores. Other than that no real side effects.
